author: Jon Porter
title: Instacart to provide face masks for workers as part of COVID-19 safety kit
description: Grocery delivery company Instacart has said it will provide its full-service shoppers with health and safety kits over COVID-19 concerns. The kits will contain a reusable cloth face mask, hand sanitizer, and a thermometer.
content:
Workers called it a step in the right direction
Photo by Smith Collection/Gado/Getty Images
Grocery delivery company Instacart says it will provide its full-service shoppers with health and safety kits days after some workers walked out over a lack of prote… [+2816 chars]
